title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2080/90 of 20 July 1990 fixing for the 1990/91 marketing year the minimum price to be paid to producers for tomatoes and the amount of production aid for processed tomato products
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2080/90
of 20 July 1990
fixing for the 1990/91 marketing year the minimum price to be paid to producers for tomatoes and the amount of production aid for processed tomato products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Where processing taking place outside the Member State in which the produce was grown, such Member State shall furnish proof to the Member State paying the production aid that the minimum price payable to the producer has been paid.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
